articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Ryomyong Street under Construction Again
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Provides Again Field Guidance to Construction Site of Ryomyong Street
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided filed guidance to the construction site of Ryomyong Street again.
					 After arriving at the construction site of Ryomyong Street early in the morning, he watched the brightly illuminated street, his face beaming with a broad smile. 
					
					 He said that the street looked wonderful in daytime, adding it looked spectacular in the dark, too. He was pleased with scenery, noting that words would fail to fully describe the beautiful and fascinating scene of the illuminated street.
					
					 He went round various construction sites of the street to learn in detail about the construction.
					
					 Learning that the outer walls of the 70-storeyed apartment house were successfully tiled in a short span of time in an impeccable manner by solving the scientific and technological issue arising in tiling outer wall in cold weather, he said that it looks very nice. It was a good idea to install solar panels on the sunny wall so that they may have decorative effect and generate electricity, he added.
					
					 He said that not only skyscraping apartment houses but also multi- storeyed apartment houses have been built in such a peculiar style that they have their features, stressing that Ryomyong Street where both architectural structures stand in good harmony is an icon and standard of modern avenue.
					
					 He said he felt as if he were seeing the happy people who would settle in Ryomyong Street. He noted he was very pleased to think that he became able to keep the promise he made to people to complete the construction of the street till the Day of the Sun and that he would soon share again joy with them. He called for doing whatever difficult job under any circumstances, if it is favored by the people and if it is in their interests.
					
					 He set forth tasks to be fulfilled to wind up the construction of the street.
					
					 Ryomyong Street, which is under way with self-reliance and self-development as the dynamic force, will shine as a street reflecting the Party's plan to build a powerful country without fail despite vicious obstructions of the U.S. imperialists and other hostile forces, a street built with the might of a harmonious whole of the Party and the masses, a street at a high-level of socialist civilization, a street demonstrating the inexhaustible economic potentials of Juche Korea and a fairyland in the era of the Workers' Party, which tells the world it can do anything if it has a will and live better than others in its style, he stressed.
					
					 He said only 30 days are left before the Day of the Sun.
					
					 He ardently called again upon all the builders to dash ahead like the wind towards the finish line and thus successfully build the street as a monumental edifice in the era of the Workers' Party and strikingly demonstrate the invincible national power of socialist Korea.
					
					 Accompanying him were Hwang Pyong So, Kim Jong Gwan and Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Russian Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Russian Ambassador Hosts Reception
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Alexandr Matsegora gave a reception at his embassy Thursday on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the conclusion of the agreement on economic and cultural cooperation between the DPRK and Russia.
					 Invited to the reception were Sin Hong Chol, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, An Jae Chol, vice-minister of Railways, So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and officials concerned.
					
					 Present there were staff members of the Russian embassy and members of the delegation of the General Bureau of Emigration Affairs of the Ministry of Interior of the Russian Federation on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Delegation of Ministry of Interior of Russia Arrives
articles.content:
Delegation of Ministry of Interior of Russia Arrives
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the General Bureau of Emigration Affairs of the Ministry of Interior of the Russian Federation led by Deputy General Director Dmitri Demidenko arrived here on Thursday.

articles.title: Russian Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Russian Delegation Leaves
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Center for Energy and Security Studies of Russia headed by Director Anton Khlopkov left here Thursday after its visit to the DPRK.
					 During the stay, the delegation met officials concerned of the Foreign Ministry and the Institute of International Studies and exchanged views on the matters of mutual concern including the relations between the DPRK and Russia and the regional situation.

articles.title: U.S. CBS President Leaves
articles.content:
U.S. CBS President Leaves
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- David Rhodes, president of the U.S. CBS, and his party left here Thursday.
					 During the visit to the DPRK, they met with officials of the Foreign Ministry, the National Aerospace Development Administration and the Education Commission and toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum and the Pyongyang Metro.

articles.title: Korean Lawyers Committee Sheds Light on Criminal Truth of UN "Resolutions on Sanctions"
articles.content:
Korean Lawyers Committee Sheds Light on Criminal Truth of UN "Resolutions on Sanctions"
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The Korean Lawyers Committee released a white paper on Thursday to shed light on the background of the illegal "sanctions resolutions" cooked up by the UN Security Council against sovereign states and absurdity of the legal grounds claimed by the UN Secretariat.
					 According to the white paper, the history of sanctions of the UN is a history of crimes tainted with high-handedness and arbitrariness.
					
					 The white paper says:
					
					 The first sanctions resolution in the UN history was the "resolution 232" that the UNSC adopted on December 16, 1966 under the instigation of the United States, taking issue with the declaration of independence of the former Rhodesia (today's Zimbabwe) as a threat to international peace and security. 
					
					 There continued criticism of the excessive use of authority of the UN Security Council that began with adoption of the sanctions resolution against Rhodesia. This notwithstanding, the United States with a view to overthrowing those unfavorable countries mobilized the UN Security Council to manipulate the sanctions resolutions one after another on Iraq in 1990, Yugoslavia in 1991 and Libya, Cambodia, Somalia, Liberia and Rwanda in 1992.
					
					 The "sanctions resolutions" of the UN against the DPRK are criminal documents devoid of legality, morality and impartiality.
					
					 The UNSC started its scandalous path taking side with the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK by fabricating its "Resolution 82", "Resolution 83", and "Resolution 84" that "legalized" the aggression war of the U.S. imperialists against the DPRK in the 1950s and the participation of the "UN forces" therein.
					
					 The rackets of the UNSC adopting "sanctions resolutions" against the DPRK are reaching extremes today with a starting point of the "Resolution 825" railroaded to withhold its decision to withdraw from the Nuclear Non-proliferation Treaty (NPT) in May 1993 and force it to return to cooperation with the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA).
					
					 Last year, too, the UNSC under instigation of the U.S. again committed the acts of arrogation and violation of the DPRK's sovereignty by manipulating the "sanctions resolutions" 2270 and 2321 while reviling the DPRK's H-bomb test and explosion test of nuclear warhead to safeguard its sovereignty as a "threat" to international peace and security.
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear tests and ballistic missile launches are just and righteous self-defensive measures to safeguard the sovereignty and right to existence to cope with the nuclear threat of the U.S. persisting for more than half a century and they do not run counter to any international law including Article 51 (right to self-defense) of the UN Charter. 
					
					 A forum of international legal experts to clarify legal ground of the UN "sanctions resolutions" against the DPRK should be organized immediately.
					
					 The UN "sanctions resolutions" against the DPRK are not the issue confined to the DPRK alone.
					
					 As the UN history spanning more than 70 years shows, if the DPRK became the target of UN "sanctions" today, another state will become their target tomorrow.
					
					 The prevailing reality fully shows that organizing the forum of international legal experts to investigate the legal ground of ''sanctions resolutions'' is all the more pressing.
					
					 The forum of international legal experts is the place where the legality of "sanctions resolutions" can be clarified fairly from the international law perspective. 
					
					 On March 13, 2017, the permanent mission of the DPRK to the UN proposed the UN Secretariat that governmental and non-governmental experts from all states and international legal organizations attend the forum as they wish and the agenda of the forum be agreed upon reasonably in full reflection of the wishes and opinions of the attendants.
					
					 The UN Secretariat should, in accordance with its basic mission of maintaining international peace and security, fulfill its responsibility before the international community by positively responding to this proposal on organizing the forum of international legal experts to clarify the legal ground of the ''sanctions resolutions'' against the DPRK.

articles.title: Chief of AINDF Pyongyang Mission Interviewed over Impeachment of Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
Chief of AINDF Pyongyang Mission Interviewed over Impeachment of Park Geun Hye
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- Jo Il Min, chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, had an interview with KCNA on Thursday as regards traitor Park Geun Hye's removal from office in south Korea.
					 The history does not know such ruler as traitor Park who was ousted in face of bitter denunciation and ridicules by the international community for her thrice-cursed crimes enough to make all Koreans shudder and for her disgusting behaviors, Jo Il Min said, and went on:
					
					 The struggle for Park's impeachment which left significant trace in the history of all-people resistance for independence, democracy and reunification, clearly showed that nobody can dampen the ardent desire of the people to throw overboard traitor Park and her group and bring about a new life and new society.
					
					 Now south Korean society is at the important crossroads of a radical change.
					
					 Struggle to totally throw overboard the group of traitors and top class criminals and bring justice and social progress has not yet come to the end but it is just at the beginning. 
					
					 Victory belongs to the AINDF and patriotic people vigorously advancing toward independence, democracy and reunification. 
					
					 We will lighten the torch of all-out resistance and turn out in the struggle to stamp out the pro-U.S. conservative group of traitors making last-ditch effort.

articles.title: Tongdaewon Senior Middle School in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Tongdaewon Senior Middle School in Pyongyang
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- Tongdaewon Senior Middle School in Tongdaewon District, Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK, is well-known over the country for teaching well Sangmo Dance (a national dance turning round decorative tassels) and national musical instrument Kayagum.
					 Teachers of the school devote themselves to improving the skills of students, initiating them in the historical development, techniques and virtuosity of the dance and instrument.
					
					 The school tops all schools across the country in its performance. The school had put it on the stage of different performances like the grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang" to be highly acclaimed by audience.
					
					 And its students successfully played Kayagum in the annual New Year performance, enjoying the admiration.

articles.title: February 16 Science and Technology Prize Awarded
articles.content:
February 16 Science and Technology Prize Awarded
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- A February 16 Science and Technology Prize-awarding ceremony took place at the People's Palace of Culture here on Thursday.
					 Present there were Choe Thae Bok, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Ri Chung Gil, chairman of the State Science and Technology Commission who is chairman of the C.C., General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea, Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission, Jang Chol, president of the State Academy of Sciences, officials concerned, scientists, technicians and teachers.
					
					 Certificates of February 16 Science and Technology Prize and medals were conferred on 10-odd major projects and certificates of sci-tech innovation prize on three major projects.
					
					 More than 220 scientists, technicians, teachers and officials of the State Academy of Sciences, Capital City Construction Commission, Kim Il Sung University and other units received certificates of the prize.
					
					 Jong Il Chol of Kim Chaek University of Technology, Choe Kil Yong of the State Academy of Sciences, Jang Song Hun of Kim Il Sung University, Kim Sung Nam of the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex, Ri Mu Chol of Kim Chaek University of Technology and Om Ki Su of Kim Il Sung University were chosen as the best scientists and technicians in 2016.

articles.title: 19th Kimilsungia Festival to Be Held
articles.content:
19th Kimilsungia Festival to Be Held
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The 19th Kimilsungia Festival is to be held at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition here from mid-April to mark the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Taking part in festival will be armed forces organs, ministries, national institutions, and citizens from all walks of life, school youth and children, the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and other overseas compatriots' organizations and foreign friends.
					
					 Kimilsungia exhibitions and visit to Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia greenhouses will be held in local areas.

articles.title: Minju Joson on Traitor Park Geun Hye's Impeachment
articles.content:
Minju Joson on Traitor Park Geun Hye's Impeachment
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The impeachment of traitor Park Geun Hye is a historic victory of justice brought about by the united strength of the south Korean people.
					 The political history of south Korea recorded lots of mass resistance, big or small, but never has there been such a case in which the people defeated injustice with candlelight of justice and won all-people victory by bringing down the pro-American conservative regime which boasted of omnipotent power.
					
					 Minju Joson Thursday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The south Koreans won a victory in their anti-Park resistance but it is just a beginning in the actions for genuine justice and social progress.
					
					 Nothing will change fundamentally although scarecrow-like Park is brought down.
					
					 On the contrary, the group of conservatives including Hwang Kyo An, Han Min Gu, Yun Pyong Se and Hong Yong Phyo are enforcing the treacherous policy of Park, noisily fanning up the confrontation atmosphere between fellow countrymen.
					
					 This is no more than a desperate effort to turn back the stream of the history at any cost by currying favor with the U.S.-Japan masters.
					
					 The south Korean people should definitely throw overboard the reactionaries of history with the zeal and courage with which they brought down the citadel of pro-U.S. and pro-Japanese conservative forces by dint of justice and unity and work hard to carve out a bright future of new society and reunification and prosperity.

articles.title: U.S. Imperialists and Their Stooges Escalate Nuclear Threat and Blackmail against DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. Imperialists and Their Stooges Escalate Nuclear Threat and Blackmail against DPRK
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and their stooges are escalating their nuclear threat and blackmail against the DPRK.
					 After letting a formation of B-1B nuclear strategic bombers take off from the Anderson air force base on Guam on Mar. 15, the U.S. imperialists made the bombers stealthily fly over the Sangdong firing range of south Korea to stage the drill of dropping nuclear bombs aimed at making preemptive strikes at major targets of the DPRK for about an hour.
					
					 Timed to coincide with this, the U.S. imperialists let the task force of Carl Vinson, nuclear-powered super-large carrier, keen on a drill for blitzkrieg strike on the DPRK in the East Sea of Korea, enter Pusan Port and opened it to media.
					
					 From some days ago, they deployed Aegis destroyers of the U.S. imperialist forces for aggression, the Japan "Self-Defense Forces" and the south Korean puppet forces in the East Sea of Korea under the pretext of coping with the "provocation" of the DPRK and are openly staging the drill of "intercepting the north's missiles" as a separate item of the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises.
					
					 This proves clearly that the enemies' reckless military act to make a preemptive nuclear attack upon the DPRK has reached a very dangerous phase
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and their stooges should clearly bear in mind that nuclear treasured sword of the DPRK keeping highly alert will more mercilessly deal anytime a sledge-hammer blow to the enemies resorting to desperate moves for igniting a nuclear war despite our repeated warnings. 
					
					 The Korean People's Army makes no empty talk.

articles.title: Actions Staged in S. Korea against THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
Actions Staged in S. Korea against THAAD Deployment
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- Civic and social organizations in south Korea strongly protest against the U.S. and south Korean puppet authorities' stepped-up moves for the deployment of THAAD, according to press reports.
					 On March 10 the U.S. Department of State once again disclosed  its sinister intention to accelerate the deployment of THAAD, asserting that the "south Korea-U.S. alliance remains solid " and "regime change in south Korea would not affect the deployment of THAAD."
					
					 Angered by this, organizations of various circles are becoming increasingly assertive that "in the wake of impeachment of Park Geun Hye there should be changes in the unification and diplomatic policies."
					
					 Members of the Songju Emergency Measure Committee for Defending Holy Land of Won Buddhism launched over-night sit-in strike around the road leading to the holy land on March 11.
					
					 Many other organizations released statements denouncing the deployment of THAAD.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Urges Prosecution to Investigate Park Geun Hye and Search Chongwadae
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Urges Prosecution to Investigate Park Geun Hye and Search Chongwadae
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The People's Emergency Action for Forcing Park Geun Hye Regime to Step Down held a press conference in Seoul on March 14, urging the prosecution authorities to summon and investigate impeached Park Geun Hye and search Chongwadae at once, according to Newsis of south Korea.
					 Noting Park is suspected of being involved in 13 kinds of crimes including bribery and abuse of power, speakers at the conference said Park deserves life imprisonment or more than 10 years in prison for bribery alone.
					
					 As her flight is a matter of concern in the light of her behavior, her "exit" should be banned, they held.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Demands Stop to Joint Military Drills against North
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Demands Stop to Joint Military Drills against North
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The Taejon Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration held a press conference outside the Taejon City Office on Mar. 13 at which it strongly demanded an immediate stop to the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills which bring the danger of a nuclear war to the Korean peninsula, according to the south Korean Internet newspaper Tongil News.
					 At the conference speakers held that the joint military drills against the DPRK are a product of the U.S. and the ultra-right conservative forces' scenario to cope with the present south Korean situation by fanning up war hysteria.
					
					 In a press release, the organization denounced the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers for going reckless with Key Resolve and Foal Eagle.

articles.title: THAAD Deployment and War Drills Denounced in S. Korea
articles.content:
THAAD Deployment and War Drills Denounced in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The Kwangju Action to Check THAAD Deployment and the South Jolla Movement Headquarters in south Korea reportedly called press conferences on March 13 in protest against THAAD Deployment and demand of stop to the joint military drills. 
					 Meanwhile, the People's Action for Peace against War held a joint press conference with 41 organizations in Seoul on the same day to urge the authorities to stop the joint military drills with the U.S. and establish a peace-keeping mechanism.
					
					 Speakers demanded an immediate stop to the joint military drills as they escalate the danger of war on the Korean peninsula and back the moves to form the U.S.-Japan-south Korea tri-angular military alliance and provide Japan with a chance for reinvasion.

articles.title: GS of World Communion of Reformed Churches Sends Letter to U.S. Secretary of State
articles.content:
GS of World Communion of Reformed Churches Sends Letter to U.S. Secretary of State
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- Chris Ferguson, general secretary of the World Communion of Reformed Churches, recently sent a letter to the U.S. secretary of State.
					 The letter referred to the fact that the communion has strengthened the worldwide cooperation for the peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula which is of very importance in ensuring the regional and global peace.
					
					 And it noted that the communion delegation was deeply moved to witness the achievements made in the fields of science and technology, architecture and the economy and the vigorous people of the DPRK during its visit to it last year.
					
					 It also said the delegation could not but regard the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises as a clear expression of the stand for aggression on the DPRK.
					
					 The communion urgently urges the U.S. to stop the provocative military exercises and all other countries to opt for the equally respected genuine dialogue for ensuring the lasting peace of Northeast Asia and the U.S. administration to take decisive measures to replace the Armistice Agreement with a peace accord, the letter stressed.
					
					 Condemning the inhuman and coldhearted sanctions applied to the DPRK, the letter held that the U.S. government should opt for lifting all the UNSC sanctions and proposing negotiations for an end to the tension in the Korean peninsula and confidence-building.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drill Slammed Abroad
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drill Slammed Abroad
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- Organizations in Denmark and Iceland on Mar. 7 made public statements in denunciation of the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises targeting the DPRK.
					 The Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association said in its statement:
					
					 Large-scale joint military exercises are now going on in south Korea under the baton of the U.S.
					
					 The exercises with all sorts of the U.S. strategic assets including nuclear carriers, nuclear submarine, nuclear strategic bombers and stealth fighters involved are an open and actual war drill aimed to make a preemptive attack on the DPRK.
					
					 We strongly condemn the said military drill.
					
					 We extend full support and solidarity to the just struggle of the Korean people for neutralizing the danger of war on the Korean peninsula and protecting the country's sovereignty and prestige.
					
					 The Iceland-DPRK Friendship and Cultural Society in its statement strongly rejected the joint military exercises as a dangerous action which further inflames the acute situation on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The society demanded that the U.S. promptly stop the war games and accept the fair proposals of the DPRK for ironing out the tension and creating peaceful environment on the Korean peninsula by replacing the armistice agreement with a peace accord.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un vuelve a dirigir en terreno la construccion de avenida Ryomyong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un vuelve a dirigir en terreno la construccion de avenida Ryomyong
Pyongyang, 16 de marzo (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, volvio a dirigir en el terreno la construccion de la avenida Ryomyong.
					Llegado a la madrugada al campo de construccion, el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un miro con satisfaccion el panorama de la avenida sumergida en el mar de luz y dijo con alegria que es muy pintoresco tanto en el dia como en la oscuridad y que sera dificil expresar con las palabras o letras la hermosura de la calle si esta se adorna con las lamparillas.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente estudio en detalle el estado de construccion recorriendo varios lugares.
					
					Elogio que terminaron perfectamente en un corto tiempo el azulejuelo del apartamento de 70 pisos al resolver el problema cientifico y tecnico para azulejar en tiempo frio e instalaron de manera decorativa los colectores solares planos.
					
					Construyeron con peculiaridad las manzanas de rascacielos y viviendas de varios pisos, dijo y alabo que la avenida Ryomyong es el modelo de la arquitectura moderna que tiene la perfecta simetria de los rascacielos y otros apartamentos de varios pisos.
					
					Se siente muy alegre al pensar que podemos cumplir la promesa con el pueblo de terminar hasta el Dia del Sol la construccion de la avenida y compartir la nueva alegria con el pueblo, dijo y continuo que debemos hacer cualquier trabajo dificil si le gusta al pueblo y respeta sus intereses.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente presento las tareas que se presentan en el acabamiento de la obra.
					
					La avenida Ryomyong, que se construye basandose en la gran fuerza motriz de autofortalecimiento se levantara como reparto que refleja la idea de nuestro Partido de construir a toda costa el pais poderoso rechazando las perversas obstrucciones de los imperialistas norteamericanos y otras fuerzas hostiles, como avenida que muestra el poderio de la unidad monolitica del Partido y las masas populares, la civilizacion socialista y la inagotable potencialidad economica de Corea del Juche y como calle que manifiesta a todo el mundo la verdad de de que podemos hacer todo lo decidido por nosotros y vivir felizmente a nuestra manera, destaco.
					
					Faltan nada mas que 30 dias hasta el Dia del Sol, senalo y exhorto de nuevo y fervientemente a todos los constructores a avanzar con dinamismo hasta la meta y levantar magnificamente la avenida Ryomyong como creacion monumental de la epoca del PTC para asi manifestar plenamente el gran poderio nacional de Corea socialista.
					
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So, Kim Jong Gwan y Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Se efectuara XIX Festival de Kimilsungias
articles.content:
Se efectuara XIX Festival de Kimilsungias
Pyongyang, 16 de marzo (ACNC) -- En ocasion del aniversario 105 del nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung, tendra lugar a mediados de abril en esta capital el XIX Festival de Kimilsungias.
					En esta edicion tomaran parte las instituciones de fuerzas armadas, los ministerios, los organos centrales, los trabajadores de diversos estratos, los jovenes y ninos escolares, asi como las entidades de los coreanos residentes en ultramar como la Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon) y los amigos extranjeros.
					
					En diversas localidades tambien se abriran las exposiciones de la flor inmortal y se organizaran las visitas a los invernaderos de Kimilsungias y Kimjongilias.
					
					s031603 - Secretario general de CMRI envia carta al secretario de Estado de EE.UU.
					
					Pyongyang, 16 de marzo (ACNC) -- Chris Ferguson, secretario general de la Comunion Mundial de Reformadas Iglesias envio recientemente una carta al secretario de Estado de EE.UU.
					
					La carta recuerda el hecho de que en el pasado la entidad religiosa fortalecio la cooperacion mundial por la paz y la reunificacion de la Peninsula Coreana que tienen gran importancia en el aseguramiento de la paz de la region y el mundo.
					
					Y senala que el ano pasado, la delegacion de la entidad visito la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea donde quedo conmovida presenciando los exitos logrados en las ciencias y tecnicas, la arquitectura y la economia y el aspecto animado del pueblo.
					
					Insiste en que durante su permanencia, reconocio que los ejercicios conjuntos militares de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea no pasan de ser una expresion clara de la posicion agresiva contra la RPDC.
					
					Enfatiza que la entidad urge a EE.UU. cesar los provocativos entrenamientos militares e iniciar el dialogo sincero por la paz duradera del Noreste de Asia en que todos los paises son respetados igualmente y a la administracion norteamericana tomar medidas decisivas para cambiar de Acuerdo de Armisticio por el convenio de paz.
					
					Tras revelar la inhumanidad y la frialdad de las sanciones impuestas a la RPDC, la misiva exigio al gobierno estadounidense a abandonar todas las sanciones del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU y a tomar parte en la iniciativa por negociar para erradicar el estado de tension en la Peninsula Coreana y establecer la confianza.

articles.title: EE.UU. y sus lacayos fortalecen amenazas y chantajes nucleares
articles.content:
EE.UU. y sus lacayos fortalecen amenazas y chantajes nucleares
Pyongyang, 16 de marzo (ACNC) -- Los imperialistas yanquis y sus lacayos estan fortaleciendo de manera escalonada las maniobras de amenazas y chantajes nucleares contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					El 15 de marzo, los yanquis introdujeron en secreto en el Sur de Corea la escuadra de los bombarderos estrategicos nucleares B-1B de la base de las fuerzas aereas Anderson en la isla Guam y perpetraron casi una hora en el cielo sobre el campo de tiro de Sangdong el ejercicio de lanzamiento de bombas nucleares para dar ataque preventivo contra los objetos principales de la RPDC.
					
					Al mismo tiempo, hicieron entrar en el Puerto de Pusan el portaaviones nuclear de tamano supergrande Carl Vinson que participa en el Mar Este de Corea en el ejercicio de asalto sorpresivo contra la RPDC publicandolo ante los medios de prensa.
					
					Hace unos dias, bajo el pretexto de enfrentar a la "provocacion" de la RPDC, desplegaron abiertamente en el Mar Este el "ejercicio de interceptacion de los misiles del Norte (de Corea)", aparte de los ejercicios conjuntos militares Key Resolve y Foal Eagle de Corea, movilizando los destructores Aegis de las tropas norteamericanas, las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" de Japon y el ejercito titere surcoreano.
					
					Esto comprueba claramente que entro en la etapa peligrosisima la imprudencia militar de los enemigos para realizar a toda costa el ataque preventivo nuclear contra la RPDC.
					
					Los imperialistas norteamericanos y sus lacayos deben tener presentes.
					
					Por mucho que ellos recurren de manera frenetica a las maniobras provocativas de guerra nuclear, pese a las reiteradas advertencias de la RPDC, las fuerzas armadas nucleares coreanas que estan en estado de alerta asestaran en cualquier tiempo el ataque de castigo despiadado.
					
					Nuestro ejercito no dice palabras hueras.

articles.title: Dimision de Park Geun-hye es la victoria del pueblo surcoreano, afirma Minju Joson
articles.content:
Dimision de Park Geun-hye es la victoria del pueblo surcoreano, afirma Minju Joson
Pyongyang, 16 de marzo (ACNC) -- La destitucion de la traidora Park Geun-hye es la victoria historica de la justicia lograda con las fuerzas unidas de la poblacion surcoreana. 
					Senala asi el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual divulgado este jueves y continua:
					
					En la historia de politica surcoreana estan registradas no pocas resistencias populares de dimensiones pequenas y grandes, pero es la primera vez que se logra la victoria mas popular en la lucha justa con velas que mediante las fuerzas unidas de las masas populares, trajo la victoria sobre la injusticia y derrumbo el "poder" conservador y proyanqui que se jactaba de su omnipotencia. 
					
					Triunfo la resistencia anti-Park Geun-hye de la poblacion surcoreana, pero esta victoria no es mas que el comienzo de la lucha por la genuina justicia y el progreso social.
					
					La dimision de Park no trajo el cambio radical en la sociedad surcoreana. 
					
					Hwang Kyo An, Han Min Gu, Yun Pyong Se, Hong Yong Phyo y otros conservadores obstinados mantienen la politica vendepatria de Park infundiendo el ambiente de enfrentamiento fratricida a fin de ganarse la simpatia de sus amos norteamericano y japones y dar curso inverso a la corriente de la historia. 
					
					Redoblando el coraje con que destruyeron el bastion de las fuerzas conservadoras proyanquis y projaponesas, la poblacion surcoreana debe luchar con dinamismo por sepultar a todos los reaccionarios de la historia, construir un nuevo mundo y forjar el futuro de la patria reunificada y prospera.
